sourcesContent:
Variation checkbox

We can create any creative design by using (type='checkbox')attribute.

@for (allData of variationCheckbox; track allData) {
{{allData.title}}
@for (data of allData.data; track data) {
}
}
It's time to upgrade

Select the theme that best suits your requirements, and you're ready to go!

@for (data of themeSale; track data) {
  • {{ data.text }}
  • {{ data.sale }} Sales
